## Load libraries and establish settings

```{r}
# Turn off scientific notation
options(scipen=999)

# Load the tidyverse.
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
```

## Read facilities

```{r}
directory_current <- read_csv("LCC Directory.csv")

directory_clean <- directory_current %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(county) %>% 
  count()

directory_17 <- read_csv("LCC Directory 17.csv")

directory_17_clean <- directory_17 %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(county) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  rename(n_17 = n)

directory_dif <- directory_clean %>% 
  left_join(directory_17_clean) %>% 
  mutate(percent_dif = (n_17-n)/n*100)
```
